title: Nearly half of resident physicians report burnout

title_detail.value: Nearly half of resident physicians report burnout

summary: Resident physician burnout in the US is widespread, with the highest rates concentrated in certain specialties, according to research from Mayo Clinic, OHSU and collaborators.

summary_detail.value: Resident physician burnout in the US is widespread, with the highest rates concentrated in certain specialties, according to research from Mayo Clinic, OHSU and collaborators.
